blocks.content: Define the internal direct product of a family of subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-dprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cdprd, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s2)), cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cdm(cv(s2)), wa(wral(s4, cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))), wss(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))), wceq(cin(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(cv(s2), cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))))))), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))), crn(cmpt(s5, crab(s2, cixp(s3, cdm(cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), co(cv(s0), cgsu, cv(s5))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-dprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ DProd =(s0 ‚àà Grp, s1 ‚àà { s2 |((s2 : dom(s2)‚Üí(SubGrp ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà dom(s2),(‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(dom(s2)\ { s3 }),(s2 ` s3)‚äÜ((Cntz ` s0)`(s2 ` s4)))‚àß((s2 ` s3)‚ãÇ((mrCls `(SubGrp ` s0))` ‚ãÉ(s2 "(dom(s2)\ { s3 }))))= {(0 ` s0)})))} ‚Ü¶ ran((s5 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà √ó(s3 ‚àà dom(s1),(s1 ` s3))| s2[finSupp](0 ` s0)} ‚Ü¶(s0[gsum]s5))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: reldmdprd
blocks.content: The domain of the internal direct product operation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmdprd() {
  |- wrel(cdm(cdprd))
} = {

  df-dprd(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)

  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}

  ‚ä¢ Rel(dom(DProd))

  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdprd, cgrp, { hs2 |((hs2 : dom(hs2)‚Üí(SubGrp ` hs0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà dom(hs2),(‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà(dom(hs2)\ { hs3 }),(hs2 ` hs3)‚äÜ((Cntz ` hs0)`(hs2 ` hs4)))‚àß((hs2 ` hs3)‚ãÇ((mrCls `(SubGrp ` hs0))` ‚ãÉ(hs2 "(dom(hs2)\ { hs3 }))))= {(0 ` hs0)})))}, ran((hs5 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(hs1),(hs1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` hs0)} ‚Ü¶(hs0[gsum]hs5))))

blocks.name: dmdprd
blocks.content: The domain of definition of the internal direct product, which states that ` S ` is a family of subgroups that mutually commute and have trivial intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dmdprdd
blocks.content: Show that a given family is a direct product decomposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)

thm dmdprdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)), wral(s0, c5, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))
  ralrimiv(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  syl5bi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  eldifsn(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  necom(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  imp4b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  3exp2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  eqssd(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  snssd(c3, cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  elind(c3, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c5, c1, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  subg0cl(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c0, c3)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), wcel(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  sstrd(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(csubg, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl5ss(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(csubg, c0), crn(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  imassrn(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wss(crn(c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  frnd(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cfv(csubg, c0), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  subgacs(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  acsmre(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mresspw(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  sspwuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mrccl(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), c4)
  subg0cl(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), c0, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)), wral(s0, c5, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))))), wcel(c5, c6), wceq(cdm(c1), c5))
  fdmd(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  dmdprd(s0, s1, c5, c6, c1, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dmdprdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c5 ‚Üí(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚â† s1))‚Üí(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5)‚Üí((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))‚äÜ { c3 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 : c5 ‚Üí(SubGrp ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c5,(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))‚àß((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 })))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, (‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))‚àß((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 }))
  jca((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1))), ((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 })
  ralrimiv(s1, (c5 \ { s0 }), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), (c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  syl5bi((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), s1 ‚àà(c5 \ { s0 }), (c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)), (s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚â† s1))
  bitri(s1 ‚àà(c5 \ { s0 }), (s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s0 ‚â† s1), (s1 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s1 ‚â† s0))
  eldifsn(s1, c5, s0)
  anbi2i(s1 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚â† s0, s0 ‚â† s1)
  necom(s1, s0)
  imp4b(w0, s0 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚àà c5, s0 ‚â† s1, (c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  3exp2(w0, s0 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚àà c5, s0 ‚â† s1, (c1 ` s0)‚äÜ(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  eqssd(((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))), { c3 }, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))
  snssd(c3, ((c1 ` s0)‚ãÇ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))
  elind(c3, (c1 ` s0), (c4 ` ‚ãÉ(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5))
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c5), c3 ‚àà(c1 ` s0), (c1 ` s0)‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))

blocks.name: dprddomprc
blocks.content: A family of subgroups indexed by a proper class cannot be a family of subgroups for an internal direct product. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprddomcld
blocks.content: If a family of subgroups is a family of subgroups for an internal direct product, then it is indexed by a set. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprdval0prc
blocks.content: The internal direct product of a family of subgroups indexed by a proper class is empty. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprdval
blocks.content: The value of the internal direct product operation, which is a function mapping the (infinite, but finitely supported) cartesian product of subgroups (which mutually commute and have trivial intersections) to its (group) sum . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: eldprd
blocks.content: A class ` A ` is an internal direct product iff it is the (group) sum of an infinite, but finitely supported cartesian product of subgroups (which mutually commute and have trivial intersections). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s1, cixp(s2, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl5bb(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  sylibr(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(cop(c3, c0), cdm(cdprd)))
  eleq2s(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0), cfv(cdprd, cop(c3, c0)), wcel(cop(c3, c0), cdm(cdprd)))
  elfvdm(c2, cdprd, cop(c3, c0))
  df-ov(c3, cdprd, c0)
  df-br(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0)
  pm5.32da(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))))
  ancoms(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wb(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))))
  syl6bb(wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)))
  dprdval(s0, s1, s2, c3, c0, c1, c4, c5)
  elrnmpti(s0, c2, cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))), c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))

}

thm dprdf(class c0, class c1) {

  ‚ä¢ (c0[DProd]c1)‚äÜ c2
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, (c0[DProd]c1), c2)
  sylbi(hs0 ‚àà(c0[DProd]c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, hs0 =(c0[gsum]hs1))))
  ax-mp((hs0 ‚àà(c0[DProd]c1)‚Üî(c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, hs0 =(c0[gsum]hs1)))), dom(c1)= dom(c1))
  eqid(dom(c1))
  eldprd(hs1, hs2, hs3, c1, dom(c1), hs0, c0, { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, (0 ` c0))
  imp(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, hs0 =(c0[gsum]hs1)), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  rexlimdva(hs1, { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, hs0 =(c0[gsum]hs1), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  syl5ibrcom((c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), hs0 =(c0[gsum]hs1), hs0 ‚àà c2, (c0[gsum]hs1)‚àà c2)
  gsumzcl(c0, hs1, c2, (0 ` c0), (Cntz ` c0), dom(c1), universe, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  adantr(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c0 ‚àà Mnd)
  syl(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, c0 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà Grp)

  dmexd(c1, universe, c0[dom(DProd)]c1)

  reldmdprd()
  dprdff(hs2, hs3, hs1, dom(c1), c2, { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c1, (0 ` c0), c0, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  dprdfcntz(hs2, hs3, hs1, (Cntz ` c0), { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, dom(c1), c1, (0 ` c0), c0, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà { hs2 ‚àà √ó(hs3 ‚àà dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))

blocks.name: dprdfid
blocks.content: A function mapping all but one arguments to zero sums to the value of this argument in a direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdfid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cixp(s1, c5, cfv(c6, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c6), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c6, c7)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))
  eqtrd(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3, cfv(c0, c7), w0)
  gsumpt(c2, c0, c7, cfv(cbs, c2), c4, c5, universe, w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cmnd), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c6), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  dprdgrp(c2, c6)
  grpmnd(c2)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), w0)
  dprdwd(s2, s0, s1, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  ifclda(c3, c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  eleqtrrd(c3, cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cfv(c6, c7), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5), wceq(cv(s2), c7), wcel(c3, cfv(c6, c7)))
  fveq2d(c6, cv(s2), c7, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wn(wceq(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2))), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cfv(csubg, c2)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s2), c5, c6, cfv(csubg, c2), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c2, w0)
  subg0cl(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), c2, c4)
  sniffsupp(s2, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), c4, c5, universe, universe, c7, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  syl5eqss(co(c0, csupp, c4), csn(c7), co(cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), csupp, c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c4, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  suppss2(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c4, csn(c7), universe, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, csn(c7)))), wceq(cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c4), wne(cv(s2), c7))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, csn(c7))), wne(cv(s2), c7))
  eldifsni(cv(s2), c5, c7)
  ifnefalse(cv(s2), c7, c3, c4)
  dprddomcld(c5, c2, c6, w0)
  fvmptd3(s2, c0, c7, c3, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), cfv(c6, c7), w0)
  iftrue(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c7)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c7)
}

thm dprdfid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2[gsum]c0)= c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 = { s0 ‚àà √ó(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c4 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[dom(DProd)]c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c6)= c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(c6 ` c7))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2[gsum]c0)= c3)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2[gsum]c0)= c3)), d(s1, c2))
  jca(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[gsum]c0)= c3)
  eqtrd((c2[gsum]c0), c3, (c0 ` c7), w0)
  gsumpt(c2, c0, c7, (Base ` c2), c4, c5, universe, w0)
  3syl(w0, c2 ‚àà Mnd, c2[dom(DProd)]c6, c2 ‚àà Grp)
  dprdgrp(c2, c6)
  grpmnd(c2)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c0, c5, (Base ` c2), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, (s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)), w0)
  dprdwd(s2, s0, s1, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  ifclda(c3, c4, (c6 ` s2), (w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5), s2 = c7)
  eleqtrrd(c3, (c6 ` s2), (c6 ` c7), ((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5)‚àß s2 = c7))
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ‚àà c5, s2 = c7, c3 ‚àà(c6 ` c7))
  fveq2d(c6, s2, c7, ((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5)‚àß s2 = c7))
  simpr((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5), s2 = c7)
  adantr((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5), ¬¨ s2 = c7, c4 ‚àà(c6 ` s2))
  syl((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c5), c4 ‚àà(c6 ` s2), (c6 ` s2)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2))
  ffvelrnda(s2, c5, c6, (SubGrp ` c2), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c2, w0)
  subg0cl((c6 ` s2), c2, c4)
  sniffsupp(s2, (s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)), c4, c5, universe, universe, c7, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c2)
  eqid((s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  syl5eqss((c0[supp]c4), { c7 }, ((s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4))[supp]c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c4, (s2 ‚àà c5 ‚Ü¶ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)))
  suppss2(s2, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), c4, { c7 }, universe, w0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà(c5 \ { c7 })), if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)= c4, s2 ‚â† c7)
  adantl(w0, s2 ‚àà(c5 \ { c7 }), s2 ‚â† c7)
  eldifsni(s2, c5, c7)
  ifnefalse(s2, c7, c3, c4)
  dprddomcld(c5, c2, c6, w0)
  fvmptd3(s2, c0, c7, c3, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), (c6 ` c7), w0)
  iftrue(c3, c4, s2 = c7)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c3, c4, s2 = c7)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c7)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c7)

blocks.name: eldprdi
blocks.content: The domain of definition of the internal direct product, which states that ` S ` is a family of subgroups that mutually commute and have trivial intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldprdi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, cixp(s1, c5, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2), wrex(hs0, c4, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cv(hs0)))))
  sylancl(w0, wrex(hs0, c4, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, c4), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, c1)))
  eqid(co(c0, cgsu, c1))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c1, c4, co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cgsu)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2), wrex(hs0, c4, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cdm(c2), c5))
  eldprd(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c5, co(c0, cgsu, c1), c0, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cgsu, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm eldprdi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà(c0[DProd]c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 = { s0 ‚àà √ó(s1 ‚àà c5,(c2 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c3 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c2)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà(c0[DProd]c2)), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)‚àà(c0[DProd]c2)), d(s0, c3))
  mpbir2and(w0, (c0[gsum]c1)‚àà(c0[DProd]c2), c0[dom(DProd)]c2, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]hs0)))
  sylancl(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]hs0)), c1 ‚àà c4, (c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]c1))
  eqid((c0[gsum]c1))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c1, c4, (c0[gsum]c1), (c0[gsum]c1), (c0[gsum]hs0))
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cgsu)
  syl(w0, ((c0[gsum]c1)‚àà(c0[DProd]c2)‚Üî(c0[dom(DProd)]c2 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]hs0)))), dom(c2)= c5)
  eldprd(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c5, (c0[gsum]c1), c0, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[gsum]c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: dprdfinv
blocks.content: Take the inverse of a group sum over a family of elements of disjoint subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdfinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wceq(co(c3, cgsu, ccom(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, co(c3, cgsu, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, cixp(s1, c5, cfv(c6, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c4)))

thm dprdfinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3[gsum](c0 ‚àò c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { s0 ‚àà √ó(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c4 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3[dom(DProd)]c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c6)= c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(invg ` c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3[gsum](c0 ‚àò c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà c2 ‚àß(c3[gsum](c0 ‚àò c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))), d(s1, c3))
  jca(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà c2, (c3[gsum](c0 ‚àò c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))

  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c6, (SubGrp ` c3), w0)

  eqtrd((c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), c4, (c0 ` c4), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c5 \(c1[supp]c4))))
  fveq2d(c0, (c1 ` hs0), c4, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c5 \(c1[supp]c4))))

blocks.name: dprdfsub
blocks.content: Take the difference of group sums over two families of elements of disjoint subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprdf11
blocks.content: Two group sums over a direct product that give the same value are equal as functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)

  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c5, c3)), wral(hs0, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), c3))), wral(hs0, c5, wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), universe)))

blocks.name: dprdsubg

thm dprdsubg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))

  mpbir3and(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), crab(hs2, cixp(hs3, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs3))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))), wfn(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1)), wral(hs4, cdm(c1), wcel(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c1, cv(hs4)))), wbr(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  mp1i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wfn(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), universe))

  adantl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs4), cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  fvconst2(cv(hs4), cdm(c1), cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs4), cdm(c1))), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c1, cv(hs4))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))

thm dprdlub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[DProd]c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c1)= c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c1 ` s0)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsstrd((c0[DProd]c1), c2, ran((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)} ‚Ü¶(c0[gsum]hs0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[DProd]c1)= ran((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)} ‚Ü¶(c0[gsum]hs0))), c0[dom(DProd)]c1, dom(c1)= c3)
  dprdval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c3, { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, (0 ` c0))
  frnd((hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)} ‚Ü¶(c0[gsum]hs0)), c2, { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, (c0[gsum]hs0), c2, w0)
  gsumzsubmcl(c0, hs0, c2, (0 ` c0), (Cntz ` c0), c3, universe, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  3syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), c0 ‚àà Mnd, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  dprdgrp(c0, c1)
  grpmnd(c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  dprddomcld(c3, c0, c1, w0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), c2 ‚àà(SubMnd ` c0), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  subgsubm(c2, c0)
  sylanbrc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), (hs0 : c3 ‚Üí c2), hs0[Fn]c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  ffnd(hs0, c3, (Base ` c0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  dprdff(hs1, hs2, hs0, c3, (Base ` c0), { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c1, (0 ` c0), c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), (hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2)
  sseldd((hs0 ` s0), c2, (c1 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})‚àß s0 ‚àà c3))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, s0 ‚àà c3, (c1 ` s0)‚äÜ c2)
  dprdfcl(hs1, hs2, s0, c3, hs0, c1, { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, (0 ` c0), c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  ffnfv(s0, hs0, c3, c2)
  dprdfcntz(hs1, hs2, hs0, (Cntz ` c0), { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c3, c1, (0 ` c0), c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
  dprdffsupp(hs1, hs2, hs0, (0 ` c0), { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c3, c1, c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid({ hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, dom(c1)= c3)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((0 ` c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, { hs1 ‚àà √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs1, √ó(hs2 ‚àà c3,(c1 ` hs2)), hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0))
  diff.cixp.s(s0, hs2, c3, (c1 ` hs2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs1, cfsupp, (0 ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c0)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: dprdspan
blocks.content: The direct product is the span of the union of the factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm dprdspan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  id(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  eqidd(cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mrccl(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(crn(c1)), c2)
  sstrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), cuni(crn(c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1))))
  r19.21bi(hs0, cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cuni(crn(c1))))
  sylib(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wral(hs0, cdm(c1), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cuni(crn(c1)))), wss(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1))))
  syl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1))), wceq(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1))))
  eqimss(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1)))
  iunss(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cuni(crn(c1)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1)))))
  mrcssidd(cuni(crn(c1)), c2, cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  syl6ss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c0), co(c0, cdprd, c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprdssv(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl3anc(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  3syl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  dprdgrp(c0, c1)
  subgacs(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  acsmre(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqsstr3d(cuni(crn(c1)), co(c0, cdprd, c1), ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  syl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1))), wfn(c1, cdm(c1)))
  ffnd(c1, cdm(c1), cfv(csubg, c0), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprdf(c0, c1)
  fniunfv(hs0, c1, cdm(c1))
  sylibr(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(c1), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))

blocks.name: dprdss
blocks.content: Create a direct product by finding subgroups inside each factor of another direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm dprdss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)))
  dmdprdd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), c3, universe, w0)
  dprddomcld(c3, c0, c2, w0)
  sstrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2antr1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  sstrd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  dprdcntz(c2, cv(hs0), cfv(ccntz, c0), cv(hs1), c0, c3, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2))

  simpr1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  simpr3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))

  ffvelrnd(c2, cv(hs1), cfv(csubg, c0), c3, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wf(c2, c3, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  subgss(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  rspcdva(s0, cv(hs1), c3, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: dprdz
blocks.content: A family consisting entirely of trivial groups is an internal direct product, the product of which is the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dprd0
blocks.content: The empty family is an internal direct product, the product of which is the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprd0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1))), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  dprdz(hs0, c0, emptycls, universe, c1)
  anbi12i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1)))
  breq2i(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1)), emptycls)
  eqeq1i(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1), co(c0, cdprd, emptycls))
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1)), emptycls)
  mpt0(hs0, csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.content: Rearrange the index set of a direct product family. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdf1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c2, c4, c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  syl6breq(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), w0)
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2)))))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), w0)
  syl5eqr(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), w0)
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), ccom(c1, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(crn(c2), crn(c2)))
  ssid(crn(c2))
  cores(c2, crn(c2), c1)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)))
  dprdf1o(c0, cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2, crn(c2), c4, w0)
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, crn(c2))), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  fdmd(cres(c1, crn(c2)), crn(c2), cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, crn(c2), cfv(csubg, c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wf1o(c2, c4, crn(c2)), wf1(c2, c4, c3))
  f1f1orn(c2, c4, c3)
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, crn(c2))))
  dprdres(c0, c1, crn(c2), c3, w0)
  3syl(w0, wss(crn(c2), c3), wf1(c2, c4, c3), wf(c2, c4, c3))
  f1f(c2, c4, c3)
  frn(c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dprdf1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[dom(DProd)](c1 ‚àò c2)‚àß(c0[DProd](c1 ‚àò c2))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c1)= c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c4 ‚Ü£ c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 ‚àò c2), (c0[DProd](c1 ‚àò c2))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1))
  syl6breq(c0, dom(DProd), (c1 ‚àò c2), ((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2), w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)]((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2), (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2))=(c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))))
  eqsstrd((c0[DProd](c1 ‚àò c2)), (c0[DProd]c1), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), w0)
  syl5eqr((c0[DProd](c1 ‚àò c2)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2)), w0)
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, ((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2), (c1 ‚àò c2))
  ax-mp(((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2)=(c1 ‚àò c2), ran(c2)‚äÜ ran(c2))
  ssid(ran(c2))
  cores(c2, ran(c2), c1)
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2))=(c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), c0[dom(DProd)]((c1 |` ran(c2))‚àò c2))
  dprdf1o(c0, (c1 |` ran(c2)), c2, ran(c2), c4, w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` ran(c2)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2)))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1))
  fdmd((c1 |` ran(c2)), ran(c2), (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, ran(c2), (SubGrp ` c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 : c4 ‚Üî ran(c2)), (c2 : c4 ‚Ü£ c3))
  f1f1orn(c2, c4, c3)
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2)))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` ran(c2)))
  dprdres(c0, c1, ran(c2), c3, w0)
  3syl(w0, ran(c2)‚äÜ c3, (c2 : c4 ‚Ü£ c3), (c2 : c4 ‚Üí c3))
  f1f(c2, c4, c3)
  frn(c2, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: dprdsn
blocks.content: A singleton family is an internal direct product, the product of which is the given subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

  sselda(cv(hs0), c2, c5, w0)

thm dprdcntz2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))‚äÜ(c3 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c1)= c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚äÜ c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c4)= ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Cntz ` c0)
} = {
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, (c1 |` c2), (c3 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), c2, w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1))

  dmres(c1, c2)
  sylib(w0, (c2 ‚ãÇ dom(c1))= c2, c2 ‚äÜ dom(c1))
  sseqtr4d(c2, dom(c1), c5, w0)
  df-ss(c2, dom(c1))
  sylancl(w0, (c3 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))‚äÜ(Base ` c0))
  dprdssv(c0, (c1 |` c4), (Base ` c0))
  cntzsubg(c0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), (Base ` c0), c3)
  eqsstrd(((c1 |` c2)` hs0), (c3 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c1 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, ((c1 |` c2)` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  fvres(hs0, c2, c1)
  cntzrecd((c1 ` hs0), c3, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), c0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))
  dprdsubg(c0, (c1 |` c4))
  dprdlub(hs1, c0, (c1 |` c4), (c3 `(c1 ` hs0)), c4, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))‚äÜ(c0[DProd]c1))
  dprdres(c0, c1, c4, c5, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, dom((c1 |` c4))= c4)
  syl5eq(dom((c1 |` c4)), c4, (c4 ‚ãÇ dom(c1)), w0)
  dmres(c1, c4)
  sylib(w0, (c4 ‚ãÇ dom(c1))= c4, c4 ‚äÜ dom(c1))
  sseqtr4d(c4, dom(c1), c5, w0)
  df-ss(c4, dom(c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c3 `(c1 ` hs0))‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà Grp, (c1 ` hs0)‚äÜ(Base ` c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚àà Grp, c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  dprdgrp(c0, c1)
  syl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c1 ` hs0)‚äÜ(Base ` c0), (c1 ` hs0)‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  syldan(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, (c1 ` hs0)‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), hs0 ‚àà c5)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c1, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c5, c0, w0)
  subgss((c1 ` hs0), c0, (Base ` c0))
  cntzsubg(c0, (c1 ` hs0), (Base ` c0), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqsstrd(((c1 |` c4)` hs1), (c3 `(c1 ` hs0)), (c1 ` hs1), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4))
  adantl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), hs1 ‚àà c4, ((c1 |` c4)` hs1)=(c1 ` hs1))

  mtbiri(w0, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), hs0 ‚àà ‚àÖ)
  noel(hs0)
  syl5bbr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), hs0 ‚àà ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà(c2 ‚ãÇ c4))
  elin(hs0, c2, c4)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c2 ‚ãÇ c4), emptycls, w0)

thm dmdprdsplit2lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wi(wcel(c2, c3), wi(wne(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c2))))), wss(cin(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c6, cuni(cima(c4, cdif(c3, csn(c0)))))), csn(c7))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, c3, cfv(csubg, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c9), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cun(c1, c9)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccntz, c8))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c8, cdm(cdprd), cres(c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c8, cdm(cdprd), cres(c4, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c8, cdprd, cres(c4, c1)), cfv(c5, co(c8, cdprd, cres(c4, c9)))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c8, cdprd, cres(c4, c1)), co(c8, cdprd, cres(c4, c9))), csn(c7)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c8)))
} = {
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, c3), wi(wne(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c2))))), wss(cin(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c6, cuni(cima(c4, cdif(c3, csn(c0)))))), csn(c7)))
  sylbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wne(c0, c2), wss(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c2)))), wo(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c9)))
  syl6bb(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wo(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c9)), wcel(c2, cun(c1, c9)))

blocks.name: dmdprdsplit2
blocks.content: The direct product splits into the direct product of any partition of the index set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmdprdsplit2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c3, c4), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cun(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))

blocks.name: dprdsplit
blocks.content: The direct product is the binary subgroup product ("sum") of the direct products of the partition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm dprdsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c4), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cun(c2, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), w0)
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  simp2d(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4))), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dmdprdsplit(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  lsmsubg(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(ccntz, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, c4)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c5, cun(c2, c4), w0)
  elun(cv(hs0), c2, c4)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  sstrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  dprdub(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cdm(cres(c1, c2)), c2))
  fdmd(cres(c1, c2), c2, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))

  eqsstr3d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), c4, c1)
  dprdub(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0), c0, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cdm(cres(c1, c4)), c4))
  fdmd(cres(c1, c4), c4, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c4, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  lsmub2(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), c3)
  mpbi2and(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1))), wss(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[DProd]c1)=((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c5 ‚Üí(SubGrp ` c0)))

  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSSum ` c0)

  eqssd((c0[DProd]c1), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), w0)
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), c5, w0)

  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
  syldan(w0, hs0 ‚àà c5, (c1 ` hs0)‚äÜ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c4))

  eleq2d(hs0, c5, (c2 ‚ãÉ c4), w0)
  elun(hs0, c2, c4)
  jaodan(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1 ` hs0)‚äÜ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  sstrd((c1 ` hs0), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  eqsstr3d((c1 ` hs0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), ((c1 |` c2)` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))

  fvres(hs0, c2, c1)
  dprdub((c1 |` c2), hs0, c0, c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c2, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2))

blocks.content: Lemma for theorems about direct product projection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2), co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cres(c1, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), wfn(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  ffnd(c1, c3, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fnressn(c1, c3, c2)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), cfv(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  dprdsn(c2, c3, cfv(c1, c2), c0)
}

thm dpjlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[DProd](c1 |` { c2 }))=(c1 ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[dom(DProd)]c1)

} = {

  syl2anc(w0, (c0[dom(DProd)]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> } ‚àß(c0[DProd]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> })=(c1 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà c3, (c1 ` c2)‚àà(SubGrp ` c0))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, (SubGrp ` c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)

thm dpjcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))

} = {
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), w0)
  dpjlem(c3, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wss(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), wceq(cin(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), csn(cfv(c0g, c3))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), wceq(cin(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), csn(cfv(c0g, c3)))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  dmdprdsplit(c3, c0, csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1)), c2, cfv(c0g, c3), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c4, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c4)
  syl5req(c4, cun(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))), cun(csn(c1), c4), w0)
  undif2(csn(c1), c4)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c1), c4), c4), wss(csn(c1), c4))
  snssd(c1, c4, w0)
  ssequn1(csn(c1), c4)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))

thm dpjcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚äÜ(c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))))

  mpbid(w0, ((c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |` { c1 })‚àß c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))‚àß(c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))‚äÜ(c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))‚àß((c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))‚ãÇ(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))= {(0 ` c3)}), c3[dom(DProd)]c0)

thm dpjdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c2))
} = {
  eqtr3d(cin(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4), cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), w0)
  ineq1d(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  dpjlem(c2, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  simp3d(w0, wceq(cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4)), wa(wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))))), wceq(cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  dmdprdsplit(c2, c0, csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(ccntz, c2), c4, c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c3, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c3)
  syl5req(c3, cun(csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1))), cun(csn(c1), c3), w0)
  undif2(csn(c1), c3)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c1), c3), c3), wss(csn(c1), c3))
  snssd(c1, c3, w0)
  ssequn1(csn(c1), c3)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
}

thm dpjlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

} = {

  dprdsplit(c0, c1, csn(c2), c3, cdif(c4, csn(c2)), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c4, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c2), cdif(c4, csn(c2))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c2), c4)
  syl5req(c4, cun(csn(c2), cdif(c4, csn(c2))), cun(csn(c2), c4), w0)

thm dpjlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[DProd]c1)=((c1 ` c2)[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |`(c4 \ { c2 })))))

thm dpjval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2))

  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cdpj, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpj1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))))), c5, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0)))))), universe, w0)
  dpjfval(hs0, c0, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0))))), cfv(c2, c1), co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fveq2d(c2, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  oveq2d(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0)))), cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  reseq2d(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c5, csn(c1)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  difeq2d(c5, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ovexd(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)=((c2 ` c1)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })))))

  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, ((c2 ` c1)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })))), c5, ((c2 ` hs0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { hs0 })))), universe, w0)

thm dpjf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), cfv(c3, c1)))

  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cdpj, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), cfv(c3, c1)), wf(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), cfv(c3, c1)))
  pj1f(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), cfv(clsm, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), c2, cfv(c0g, c2), cfv(ccntz, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, cfv(csubg, c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)

thm dpjf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ` c1):(c2[DProd]c3)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[dom(DProd)]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c3)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c2[dProj]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ((c0 ` c1):(c2[DProd]c3)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)), (((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))):((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))‚Üí(c3 ` c1)))
  pj1f((c3 ` c1), (proj1 ` c2), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))), (LSSum ` c2), (+ ` c2), c2, (0 ` c2), (Cntz ` c2), w0)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, (SubGrp ` c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  simpld(w0, c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))‚äÜ(c2[DProd]c3))
  dprdres(c2, c3, (c4 \ { c1 }), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, { c1 }, w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, (c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, (0 ` c2), w0)
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, (Cntz ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
  feq12d((c0 ` c1), (c2[DProd]c3), (c3 ` c1), ((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), ((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), w0)
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, (proj1 ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((proj1 ` c2))
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, (LSSum ` c2), c4, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c2))
}

blocks.name: dpjeq
blocks.content: Decompose a group sum into projections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cdm(cdprd), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c5), c2))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cdpj, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cdprd, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, crab(s1, cixp(s2, c2, cfv(c5, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), c3)), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0))), co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wceq(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  eqeq1d(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0))), w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)), c7))
  dprdf11(s1, s2, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c6, c7, c2, c5, w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)), c7), wceq(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)))))
  dpjidcl(s0, s1, s2, c2, c4, c0, c7, c1, c5, c6, w0)
  mp1i(w0, wb(wceq(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), c3))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), universe)))
  rgenw(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), universe))
  fvex(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)
  mpteqb(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0), universe, c3)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c4, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dpjeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 =(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c4 ` s0)` c0)= c3)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[dom(DProd)]c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c5)= c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c1[dProj]c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[DProd]c5))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c7 = { s1 ‚àà √ó(s2 ‚àà c2,(c5 ` s2))| s1[finSupp]c6 }
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)‚àà c7)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, c0 =(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c4 ` s0)` c0)= c3), (c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0)))=(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3))
  eqeq1d(c0, (c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)), (c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))), w0)
  simprd(w0, c0 =(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))‚àà c7)
  dprdf11(s1, s2, c1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0)), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3), c6, c7, c2, c5, w0)
  simpld(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))‚àà c7, c0 =(c1[gsum](s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))))
  dpjidcl(s0, s1, s2, c2, c4, c0, c7, c1, c5, c6, w0)
  mp1i(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶((c4 ` s0)` c0))=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c3)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c4 ` s0)` c0)= c3)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((c4 ` s0)` c0)‚àà ùïå))
  rgenw(s0, c2, ((c4 ` s0)` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex((c4 ` s0), c0)
  mpteqb(s0, c2, ((c4 ` s0)` c0), universe, c3)

blocks.name: dpjid
blocks.content: The key property of projections: the sum of all the projections of ` A ` is ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)

thm dpjid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  pj1lid(c2, cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cpj1, c3), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c4, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))), cfv(cplusg, c3), c3, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(ccntz, c3), w0)

  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, cfv(c0g, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, cfv(ccntz, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cpj1, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cpj1, c2))
  oveq1d(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2, co(c2, cress, co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), w0)
  oveq2d(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), w0)
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, cfv(clsm, c2), c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c2))
}

thm dpjghm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[dom(DProd)]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c3)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c2[dProj]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  3eltr4d((c0 ` c1), ((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2), ((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), ((c2[|`s]((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))))[GrpHom]c2), w0)
  pj1ghm((c3 ` c1), (proj1 ` c2), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))), c2, (LSSum ` c2), (+ ` c2), (0 ` c2), (Cntz ` c2), w0)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, (SubGrp ` c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  simpld(w0, c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))‚äÜ(c2[DProd]c3))
  dprdres(c2, c3, (c4 \ { c1 }), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, { c1 }, w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, (c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, (0 ` c2), w0)
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, (Cntz ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, (proj1 ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((proj1 ` c2))
  oveq1d((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3)), cghm, c2, (c2[|`s]((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))), w0)
  oveq2d(c2, cress, (c2[DProd]c3), ((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), w0)
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, (LSSum ` c2), c4, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c2))
}

blocks.name: dpjghm2
blocks.content: The direct product is the binary subgroup product ("sum") of the direct products of the partition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjghm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, co(c2, cress, cfv(c3, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cdpj, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, co(c2, cress, cfv(c3, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2)))
  dpjghm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, co(c2, cress, cfv(c3, c1))))), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(crn(cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, cfv(csubg, c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  frnd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c3, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), w0)
  dpjf(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  resghm2b(cfv(c3, c1), c2, cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), co(c2, cress, cfv(c3, c1)))
  eqid(co(c2, cress, cfv(c3, c1)))
}

thm dpjghm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom](c2[|`s](c3 ` c1))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[dom(DProd)]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí dom(c3)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c2[dProj]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom](c2[|`s](c3 ` c1))), (c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2))
  dpjghm(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2)‚Üî(c0 ` c1)‚àà((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom](c2[|`s](c3 ` c1)))), (c3 ` c1)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), ran((c0 ` c1))‚äÜ(c3 ` c1))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, (SubGrp ` c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  frnd((c0 ` c1), (c3 ` c1), (c2[DProd]c3), w0)
  dpjf(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  resghm2b((c3 ` c1), c2, (c0 ` c1), (c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3)), (c2[|`s](c3 ` c1)))
  eqid((c2[|`s](c3 ` c1)))
}
